parsed_menu.description: An Italian Restaurant serving traditional dishes like lasagna and risotto. Enjoy classic Italian flavors with fresh ingredients.

menu.description: At Italian Restaurant, a selection of hearty main courses.

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Traditional baked pasta with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese
items.image_prompt: A photo of lasagna at Italian Restaurant, a traditional baked pasta dish with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese.

items.name: Tagliata Di Manzo
items.description: Sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A photo of tagliata di manzo at Italian Restaurant, sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan.

items.name: Risotto Ai Funghi
items.description: Creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A photo of risotto ai funghi at Italian Restaurant, creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan.
